property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish an ally to evade and banish this barrier. Before the encounter, bury the top card of your deck. If undefeated, leave this barrier faceup on the location deck; characters at this location encounter this barrier as their first exploration each turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, move to a random open location and shuffle this card into that location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, each character at your location is dealt 2 Fire damage, and your ship is dealt 1d4+2 Structural damage. Leave this barrier faceup on the location deck; characters at this location encounter this barrier as their first exploration each turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, you may bury a card to add a random ally from the box to your hand. If undefeated, bury a card and leave this barrier faceup on the location deck; characters at this location encounter this barrier as their first exploration each turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Abyssal Scavenger is immune to the Acid, Cold, Mental, and Poison traits. All damage dealt by the Abyssal Scavenger is Acid damage. Before you act, each character at your location is dealt 1d4 Acid damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, display this card next to your character card. While displayed, your Dexterity, Intelligence, and Charisma dice are each d4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, display this card next to your character card. While displayed, at the start of each of your turns, bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Erinyes Devil is Immune to the Fire and Poison traits. If you play a boon that has the Divine trait, banish it. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, display this card next to your character card. While displayed, your Strength, Wisdom, and Constitution dice are each d4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the check to defeat does not have the Swashbuckling trait, subtract 1 from each die rolled. If undefeated, roll 1d6. On 1-3, summon and encounter the henchman Eye of Dagon, on 4-6, summon and encounter the henchman Breath of Dagon. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If this is not the first exploration of your turn, Gorebeard Trench may not be evaded. If you play a weapon, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 5. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Damage dealt by Jakaw is also dealt to 1 other character to your location. Before you act, succeed at a Dexterity or Stealth 12 check or bury all items in your hand that do not have the Swashbuckling trait. If your character has the Human trait, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 6. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, Kipper deals 1d4+1 Ranged Combat damage to a random character. If the check to defeat does not have the Swashbuckling trait, damage dealt by Kipper is increased by 6. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this hanchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, you and a random other character at your location, if any, summon and encounter a random monster. If you played a spell on the check, after you attempt the roll; roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, start the check over. Cards played for the previous check do not affect the new check. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter Luccaria, if there are at least 3 other cards in her location deck, she is evaded, and each character at your location takes 1d4+1 Combat damage. If any character would recharge or discard a spell that has the Divine trait, bury it instead. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 13 check or discard a card that has the Attack trait, if you have one. If the check to defeat has the Swashbuckling trait, add 1d6 to it. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Sentinel Devil is immune to the Fire and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Attack or Ranged trait, discard a card before you attempt the roll. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Vrykolakas is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 13 check or bury the top 1d6 cards of your deck. If defeated, the Vrykolakas deals 1d4 Poison damage to each character at your location, and you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each time a character plays a spell, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 2. If defeated, you may banish a barrier with the Curse trait displayed in fromt of a character at your location, and you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics check or be dealt 1d6 Electricity damage. If the check to defeat has the Fire trait, add 1d6 to it. If you do not defeat the Galvo by at least 4, shuffle it into the deck it came from; the Galvo still counts as defeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Giant Sea Anemone is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Damage from failing the check to defeat the Giant Sea Anemone is Poison damage. You may succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 14 check to evade the Giant Sea Anemone. If undefeated, the Giant Sea Anemone deals 1d4 Structural damage to your ship; recharge your hand and return the Giant Sea Anemone to the top of the location deck, if it came from one.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Insanity Demon may not be evaded and is immune to the Acid and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 8 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. After you act, succeed at a Wisdom 10 check or reset your hand using 2 as your hand size; then end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Kapre is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. You may succeed at a Charisma or Diplomacy 12 check to evade the Kapre, put it on the bottom of the location deck, and move to a random location. Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom 12 check or a random character at your location takes an amount of Combat damage equal to the number of spells that have the Attack trait and weapons in your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, discard the top 1d4 cards of the blessings deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Sea Serpent is immune to the Cold and Fire traits. If undefeated, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 11 check or bury the top 1d4 cards of your deck. After you act, the Sea Serpent deals 1d4+1 Structural damage to your ship.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the check to defeat has the Fire trait, add 1d8 to it. If the check to defeat doesn't have the Fire or Acid trait, the Sea Troll is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the Spiny Eurypterid would be defeated, reroll the dice. The Spiny Eurypterid is defeated or undefeated based solely on the result of the second die roll. If the check to defeat includes the Strength or Melee trait, after you act, the Spiny Eurypterid deals 1d4 Combat damage to you.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the Tetrolimus would be defeated, reroll the dice. The Tetrolimus is defeated or undefeated based solely on the result of the second die roll. If undefeated, reset your hand and end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Voidstick Zombie is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. For the rest of the turn, the difficulty of Divine checks at your location is increased by 3, and powers that have the Healing trait used by characters at your location recharge 1 fewer card. If undefeated, each character at your location discards 1d4 cards from her deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at your location and at one other random occupied location, if any, must attempt a Dexterity or Acrobatics 12 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Fire damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d4+1 Fire damage. After you act, Adelita Doloruso deals 1d4 Force damage to a random character at your location; if the check to defeat included the Swashbuckling trait, you take the damage instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter Barnabas Harrigan, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 14 check or the difficulty of the checks to defeat are increased by 6 and he may not be evaded. Before you attempt any check to defeat, recharge 1 armor or 1d4 other cards, or discard them if you aren't the only character at your location. After you act, discard the top 1d4 cards of the blessings deck; if any check to defeat included the Swashbuckling trait, discard the top card of the blessings deck instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter Incutilis, summon and encounter a random monster. The difficulty of the check to defeat the summoned monster is increased by 10. The Incutilus is defeated or undefeated based solely on the result of that encounter. If undefeated, move to the location of a random other character; that character is dealt Combat damage equal to the number of cards that have the Attack trait and weapons in your hand.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: See Below

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Welcome to the Theater of Corruption. The show is just about to start… with your deaths!" -- Isawyn

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom 11 check or you may not play cars that have the Attack trait or weapons.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Shrouded Queen is immune to the Cold, Mental, and Poison traits. If your check to defeat has the Acid, Fire, or Electricity trait, its difficulty is increased by 5. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 12 check or recharge 1d4 cards. Then if the Shrouded Queen is not the only card in the location deck, she is evaded; summon and encounter the henchman Abyssal Scavenger instead. If undefeated, each character at your location is dealt 1d4 Poison damage and must bury the top card of his deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to succeed at your check to defeat a non-villain bane. Then shuffle this card into a random open location and bury 1d4 cards from the top of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card to succeed at your check to defeat a henchman. Discard this card to explore your location. Add the Swashbuckling trait to your combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If at least 1 of your checks to acquire this card does not have the Swashbuckling trait, discard 3 cards. Banish this card and recharge another card to examine your location deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic Aquatic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Acid or Combat damage to you by 3, or damage dealt to you by a bane with the Aquatic trait by 4. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 3 to your Constitution or Fortitude check. Reveal this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Acid, Cold, Combat, Electricity, or Fire damage dealt to you by 2. If you are proficient with light armors, you may reveal this card instead, and you may play another armor on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to any check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to any check to acquire a boon. Discard this card to explore your location. After you play this card, if it matches the top card of the blessings discard pile, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Bury any card

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, banish this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 3d8. You may additionally discard another card to add your Craft skill; after playing that card, succeed at a Craft 16 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card when you encounter a bane. You may recharge any number of cards and draw the same number of cards. After playing this card, reveal a card that has the Swashbuckling or Finesse trait to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the start of your turn, reveal this card to recharge 1 random card from your discard pile. At the end of your turn, reveal this card to recharge 1 random card from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 6 to any Constitution or Fortitude check against a card with the Aquatic trait. Recharge this card to add 6 to any check to defeat a monster with the Aquatic trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you play a spell that has the Attack trait on a check, reveal this card to add 1d6 to the check. You may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6; after playing this card, succeed at a Melee 10 check to recharge it instead of discarding it. For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+1. This counts as playing a weapon on the check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6. Add another 1d6+2 if the bane has the Outsider trait. Add 2 if a blessing is played on this check, of 5 if it is Blessing of Norgorber. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to succeed at your check to defeat a barrier with the Cache, Skirmish, or Task trait. After the check, roll 1d6; on a 1, banish a card from your hand. Discard this card to explore your location. Add the Swashbuckling trait to your non-combat checks during the exploration. After you play this card, discard a card that has the Pirate trait to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. Recharge this card to choose a character at your location; that character may evade a monster whose highest difficulty to defeat is 22 or lower. You may not use this power if the monster is immune to the Mental trait. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 2d6 and the Cold or Electricity trait to your combat check. You may play this card even if you have played another spell on this check. After you play this card, if you do not have the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 12 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d8+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8. If you are proficient with weapons, you may recharge this card to add 1d8+2 to any combat check at another location, or you may recharge this card and choose a character to succeed at a check to defeat a summoned monster.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card and choose a dead character. His player shuffles 10 of his buried cards at random into his character deck and draws a new hand. The character is no longer dead. After playing this card, if you do not ave the Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at a Divine 14 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card to add 1d6 to your combat checks. When you are dealt damage, recharge any cards you would discard. At the end of your turn, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt a Divine 13 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card; you may move at the end of your turn, reduce Fire damage dealt to you to 0, and add 1d4 to your combat checks. At the start of your turn, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt an Arcane or Divine 14 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card when a character encounters a bane. Any character who attempts a combat check this turn may recharge 2 cards to add 2d8 and the Slashing trait to it. At the end of the turn, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt a Divine 13 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d6+2; you may additionally bury this card to add another 4d4 and the Force trait. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your check. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 2d4 and the Force trait to any combat check at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 3d4 and the Fire trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If any d4 rolled on this check is a 4, count it as a 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + your Strength die + 2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6 and the Fire trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 and the Fire trait to any combat check at another location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+2; you may additionally recharge a card that has the Divine trait to add your Divine trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+2; you may additionally discard this card to add 1d6. Add another 1d8 if the bane has the Human trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d4. If any d4 rolled for this weapon is a 4, count it as a 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 2 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When setting up, after you add the villain or henchman, divide this location randomly into a stack of 6 cards and a stack of 4 cards. Each stack is treated as a different location.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: When closing a stack, summon and defeat the henchman Vrykolakas. This location remains open until both stacks are closed

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a card, then recharge a card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: These wretched isles--known as Big Jaw and Little Jaw--are the site of countless disappearances, murders, and hauntings. The shallow channel and jungle islands that divide them--known to sailors as Dagon's Gullet--take their name from the demon lord of deformity, sea monsters, and the sea. That doesn't really help their vile reputation.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 1 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 1 Item 2 Ally 0 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: If you fail a check to defeat a bane, discard 1d4 cards from the blessings deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Discard 1d4 cards from the blessings deck.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, each character at this location may roll on the Plunder Table and add a random non-Basic, non-Elite card of that type from the box to his hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The high cliffs and natural harbor of Gannet Island make for a perfect pirate sanctuary. Captain Harrigan has raised his allies and their ships into a modest armada. Harrigan's men now keep close watch over the island, assuring that the captain's numerous enemies won't sneak ashore to sabotage his plots.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 0 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 0 Blessing 0

property.name: Flavour
property.value: These wretched isles--known as Big Jaw and Little Jaw--are the site of countless disappearances, murders, and hauntings. The shallow channel and jungle islands that divide them--known to sailors as Dagon's Gullet--take their name from the demon lord of deformity, sea monsters, and the sea. That doesn't really help their vile reputation.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 1 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 3 Armor 2 Item 0 Ally 0 Blessing 3

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Add 1d8 and the Magic trait to any check to defeat a monster with the Undead trait.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Wisdom or Divine 9 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, you may banish a card to recharge 1d6 random cards from the blessings discard pile. At the start of your turn, you may recharge a card to recharge a card from your discard pile.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Portentous spirals entwine the standing stones surrounding a natural spring at the center of this clearing. The spiral shape seems to repeat in the endlessly bubbling water.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may recharge a card to recharge a card from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 1 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 0 Blessing 3

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, a random character at your location is dealt 1d4-1 Force damage. If you are the only character at this location, bury the cards you would discard as damage instead.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Bury a Blessing of Norgorber or banish 2 other blessings.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, add 1d6 random items to this location without looking at them.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: While most scalawags in the Shackles pay some measure of reverence to Besmara, the goddess of piracy, the dark god Norgorber also boasts a considerable following. Worshipers of the god of thieves and murderers eagerly lay their ill-gotten offerings upon his black altars. Some of these shrines are hidden, but in the Shackles, the dark god's worship is far from taboo.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 2 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: After you play an ally, banish it.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Choose a random other location and succeed at its When Closing requirement.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Bury 1d4 cards; then draw 1d4 cards.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A band of Chelish expatriates have moved into this abandoned tavern in Hell Harbor, repurposing it as playhouse. More than flashy theater-folk, the owners of the Theater of Corruption have used their venue to spread slander and misinformation about local pirate lords--particularly Hell Harbor's leader, Admiral Endymion. Seems there's more going on here than bad acting.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 0 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you start or end your turn at this location, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 10 check or bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 11 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, bury a card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Bloody manacles, barbed whips, bone chisels, piercing spurs, steaming liquids, smoldering braziers, and other toys fill this sweaty-smelling chamber. Someone's in store for a real good time.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: If you start or end your turn at this location, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 10 check or bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, roll 1d4; you may bury that number of cards to automatically defeat the Wanton Wastrel.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: You may discard any number of cars from the blessings deck to reduce Structural damage dealt to your ship by that number.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 5

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This sailing ship inspires terror, likely due to Captain Aiger's habit of filing his teeth to resemble those of a barracuda. The Wastrel makes a fine ally, however. The best predators are those you can see.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you bury any cards from your hand, bury 1 additional card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: After your schemes and subturfuge, Captain Barnabas Harrigan has never forgiven you for your betrayal. Now he's raised a fleet of vicious allies and set sail for the Island of Empty Eyes, intending to lay waste to all you've built. Gather your allies, seek out new supporters, and secure your reputation as a true pirate legend. With an armada of buccaneers at your back, send the ships of your former captain to the bottom of the sea. Once that thread is repelled, ensure that Harrigan and his allies never threaten anyone ever again!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: An Unforgivable Act Islands of the Damned Isle of the Black Tower The Battle of Empty Eyes Best Served Cold

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat. Gain a Class 5 ship feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Pirate Council is impressed! They've welcomed you as their newest councilors. Soon thereafter, Arronax Endymion is accused of serving as an agent of Cheliax. The veteran council member insists he's innocent. Investigate the Theater of Corruption and uncover the truth!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Merchant Marina Theater of Corruption Torture Pit Shrine to Norgorber Safehouse Festhall House of Stolen Kisses Seaside Warehouse

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your ship is anchored at the Merchant Marina.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter a Sentinel Devil, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 10 check or the Sentinel Devil may not be evaded. When you defeat a henchman, place it in a henchman pile next to this card. If Isawyn the Diva would be defeated, and this pile does not contain Lady Nightshade and Gorebeard Trench, Isawyn is undefeated.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Isawyn the Diva

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Lady Nightshade Gorebeard Trench Sentinel Devils

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: With his fleet defeated, the vile Captain Harrigan has fled to his fortress on Gannet Island. Pursue him, invade his stronghold, and eradicate his remaining allies. It's finally time for revenge!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Gannet Island Sea Fort Torture Pit Shrine to Norgorber Docks Beach Tower Harbor Coastline

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your ship is anchored at the Gannet Island.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When building location decks, replace allies with monsters. If you defeat a henchman, put it in a henchman pile next to this card. When you encounter Barnabas Harrigan, each other character must summon and encounter a random henchman from the henchman pile.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Barnabas Harrigan

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Luccaria Gilbrok the Tongue Kipper Erinyes Devils

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Howling Skull Armor, Skyrocket Crossbow

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Thwarted one time too many, Barnabas Harrigan is preparing an attack on the Island of Empty Eyes. Seek out allies to strike back before it's too late! A gang of castaway pirates on Dagon's Jaws includes a few of Harrigan's old enemies. See if anyone there might join the cause.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Dagon's Jaws Little Jaw Shipwreck Graveyard Sacred Spring Sea Caves Coastline Fog Bank Beach Torture Pit

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you defeat a Vrykolakas henchman, draw a random ally from the box and put it under the card. When you defeat the Shipwreck henchman, display it next to this card. If you win the scenario and the Shipwreck is displayed, add the loot Alise Grogblud to the reward.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Shipwreck, Vrykolakass

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Gain all the allies under this card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Great pirate leaders need more than ships and sailors. Secure your infamy and the loyalty of your followers with the bloody blade known as Aiger's Kiss. The weapon--said to have been crafted by Norgorber, the god of greed--was last seen upon the Isle of the Black Tower.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Tower Mangrove Swamp Jungle Sacred Spring Beach Harbor Coastline

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your ship is anchored at the Mangrove Swamp.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you build location decks, shuffle the villain The Shrouded Queen and the henchmen Breath of Dagon, Eye of Dagon, and Curse of the Flesheaters into the Tower location deck. Shuffle 1 Witch Doctor henchman into each other location deck.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: The Shrouded Queen

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Breath of Dagon Eye of Dagon Curse of the Flesheaters Witch Doctors

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat. Loot: Aiger's Kiss, Quickened Ray

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The fleet of Captain Barnabas Harrigan is in sight. Waves of deadly ships are advancing with the Wormwood at the fore.Strike back against them. Take down Harrigan's officers, especially his ruthless commander, Adelita Doloruso. Defend the Island of Empty Eyes at any cost!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Sea Fort Beach Harbor Rocky Cliff Jungle Mangrove Swamp Ghol-Gan Ruins Shipwreck Graveyard

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display the ship Wormwood next to a random location. Before you would encounter a monster with the Pirate trait, move the Wormwood to your location and encounter it; then encounter the bane. At the start of each turn, examine the top card of the location deck next to the Wormwood; if it is a boon, banish it. Then shuffle the location deck.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Adelita Doloruso

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Riaris Krine Jakaw Razorbeak Enemy Ships

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character chooses a type of boon other than loot and draws a random non-Basic, non-Elite card of that type from the box.
